TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPWAPDPPart

Docs.summary: An interface that enables communication between the project detail page (PDP) infrastructure and a Web Part on the PDP.

remarks.para: A Web Part must implement the IPWAPDPPart interface to integrate with the PDP infrastructure.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Project::Server::Library::DataStoreEnum DataStore { Microsoft::Office::Project::Server::Library::DataStoreEnum get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Project::Server::Library::DataStoreEnum value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies the Draft database or the Published database as the source for reading project data in a Web Part on a project detail page.
Docs.value: The value can be only WorkingStore or PublishedStore.

remarks.para: Project detail pages can be used for either viewing a published project or editing the working draft of a project. The PDP infrastructure sets the DataStore property based on the current edit mode of the project.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Editable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Editable : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a Web Part on the project detail page can be edited.
Docs.value: True if the Web Part is editable; otherwise, False.

remarks.para: The PDP infrastructure sets the IPWAPDPPart property during initialization of the PDP.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasRequiredFields As Boolean
public: property bool HasRequiredFields { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the Web Part on a project detail page has any required fields.
Docs.value: True if the Web Part has one or more required fields; otherwise, False.

remarks.para: The PDP infrastructure uses the HasRequiredFields property to determine whether the project detail page shows the Required Fields legend at the top of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid PDPUid { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };
member this.PDPUid : Guid with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the GUID of the project detail page on which a Web Part is currently loaded.

remarks.para: The PDP infrastructure sets the PDPUid property when a Web Part is initialized on a project detail page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SaveEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool SaveEnabled { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the Save button is enabled in the Web Part on a project detail page.
Docs.value: True if the Save button is enabled; otherwise, False.

remarks.para: The PDP infrastructure uses the SaveEnabled property to enable the Save button on a Web Part.
